title: 130. What Does the Restaurant of the Future Look Like?
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Tim Hand, a partner at Kinetic12, a consulting firm for the foodservice industry. Barron and Hand explore the future of the restaurant and hospitality industry post-pandemic.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
